title: UX/UI
content: I think that we need to get away from all these frameworks for design. While its nice, coders these days seem to be lacking in their CSS ability and its rather frustrating. Sometimes these frameworks just can't do what we want.

title: Free-Lance Coders
content: I am genuinely curious as to what you guys think about how many Free-lance positions there are out there. Are companies moving away from hiring full time developers?

title: Front-end or back-end development?
content: What is your favorite thing to do and why? I prefer back-end work as it is what makes everything run!
